item.title: By: Claude Betancourt
item.dc:creator: Claude Betancourt
item.description: Ominous, yet sad. Is that a soundtrack from a Stanley Kubrick film?
item.content:encoded: Ominous, yet sad. Is that a soundtrack from a Stanley Kubrick film?

item.title: By: Stephane Daury

item.description: I think you're missing the point Joseph. It's now at that age when urges come forth. This is its mating call. ;)

item.title: By: Joseph Scott

item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2011/02/15/the-mournful-rotisserie/#comment-3656">Utahcon</a>.
The next best thing to having dinner is looking forward to dinner :-)

item.title: By: Utahcon
item.dc:creator: Utahcon
item.description: Wow... you actually recorded your rotisserie for over a minute. I think you need less free time. BTW -- Some lube should solve your whining rotisserie problem.
item.content:encoded: Wow… you actually recorded your rotisserie for over a minute. I think you need less free time. BTW — Some lube should solve your whining rotisserie problem.
